hero.title: Redefine Connection with Tellow
hero.subtitle: Experience the future of video calling - crystal-clear, secure, and effortless.

about.title: About Tellow
about.content: Tellow is more than just a video calling app. It's a revolution in digital communication, seamlessly blending cutting-edge technology with intuitive design to create an unparalleled connection experience. Our mission is to break down barriers and bring people together, no matter the distance.

items.title: Crystal Clear Quality
items.description: Enjoy high-definition video and crisp audio for an immersive calling experience.

items.title: Uncompromising Security
items.description: Your calls are protected with state-of-the-art end-to-end encryption, ensuring your privacy.

items.title: Global Connectivity
items.description: Connect with anyone, anywhere in the world, breaking down geographical barriers.

items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: Experience minimal lag with our optimized servers and cutting-edge technology.

items.title: Group Calls
items.description: Host large meetings or intimate gatherings with our scalable group call feature.

items.name: Sarah J.
items.content: Tellow has transformed the way our team collaborates. The video quality is unmatched, and the interface is so intuitive. It's become an indispensable tool for us!

items.name: Michael R.
items.content: As someone who's constantly connecting with partners worldwide, Tellow's reliability and crystal-clear calls have been a game-changer. It's like being in the same room, no matter the distance.

items.question: Is Tellow free to use?
items.answer: Yes, Tellow offers a free Basic plan with essential features. We also have Pro and Enterprise plans for more advanced needs.

items.question: How secure are Tellow calls?
items.answer: All Tellow calls are protected with end-to-end encryption, ensuring your conversations remain private and secure.

items.question: Can I use Tellow on mobile devices?
items.answer: Absolutely! Tellow is available on iOS and Android devices, as well as on desktop browsers.
